attributes.action: ensure that no private space flights will be permitted from the UK until their environmental  impacts have been independently assessed and remediation mechanisms have been put in place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Virgin Galactic are investigating the use of MOD sites in the UK as launch pads for their new "space flight" service.

They are proposing to carry a handful of people on each "flight", yet the carbon emissions of their launch vehicle will be comparable with those of a long-haul flight. 

Given that the government is committed to ever higher cuts in greenhouse emissions and is acting to dissuade people from taking short-haul flights, it would be hypocritical to then enact legislation to allow private space launches to take place on British soil.

The environmental impacts of this new form of transport haven't been adequately assessed, until they have been, there should be a moratorium on private space launches in the UK.
